label: Group ID of the primary group
Samba privilege
description: Manage Samba privileges

staticValues.label: Take ownership of files or other objects
Force shutdown from a remote system
Add users and groups to the domain
Take ownership of files or other objects
Force shutdown from a remote system
Add users and groups to the domain

label: Account expiry date
description: Specifies the date from when the user is not allowed to login anymore. Enter date as "day.month.year".

label: Password expiry date
description: Specified the date from when the user must change his password. Enter date as "day.month.year".

label: User has to change password on next login
description: If enabled, the user has to change his password the next time when he logs in.

label: Account is deactivated
description: Disable the user account for Windows, Kerberos and POSIX.

label: Activate user account starting from
description: This disables the account until the specified time.

label: Unlock account
description: If the account is locked out due to too many login failures, this checkbox allows unlocking.

label: Lockout till
description: Shows the time when the account gets unlocked again according to policy.

label: E-mail address
description: This e-mail address serves only as contact information. This address has no effect on the UCS mail stack and is not related to a local mailbox.

staticValues.label: Congo, The Democratic Republic of the
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

label: Birthdate
description: Date of birth

label: Windows home path
description: The directory path which is used as the user's Windows home directory, e.g. \\ucs-file-server\smith.

label: Windows logon script
description: The user-specific logon script relative to the NETLOGON share, e.g. user.bat.

label: Windows profile directory
description: The directory path (resolvable by windows clients) e.g. %LOGONSERVER%\%USERNAME%\windows-profiles\default which is used to configure a roaming profile.

label: Windows home drive
description: The drive letter (with trailing colon) where the Windows home directory of this user lies, e.g. M:. Needs only be specified if it is different to the Samba configuration.

label: Relative ID
description: The relative ID (RID) is the local part of the SID and will be assigned automatically to next available RID. It can not be subsequently changed. Valid values are numbers upwards 1000. RIDs below 1000 are reserved to standard groups and other special objects.

label: Primary e-mail address (mailbox)
description: E-mail address that will be used to create the IMAP/POP3 mailbox and that can be used as login for SMTP/IMAP/POP3 connections. The domain must be one of the UCS hosted e-mail domains.

label: E-mail alias address
description: Additional e-mail addresses for which e-mails will be delivered to the "Primary e-mail address". The domain must be one of the UCS hosted e-mail domains.

label: Forward e-mail address
description: Incoming e-mails for this user are copied/redirected to the specified forward e-mail addresses. Depending on the forwarding setting, a local copy of each e-mail is kept. If no forwarding e-mail addresses are specified, the e-mails are always kept in the user's mailbox.

label: Forwarding setting
description: Specifies if a local copy of each incoming e-mail is kept for this user. If no forwarding e-mail addresses are specified, the e-mails are always kept in the user's mailbox.

staticValues.label: Redirect all e-mails to forward addresses
Keep e-mails and forward a copy

label: Override password history
description: No check if the password was already used is performed.

label: Override password check
description: No check for password quality and minimum length is performed.

label: Home share
description: Share, the user's home directory resides on

label: Home share path
description: Path to the home directory on the home share

label: Allow the authentication only on this Microsoft Windows host
Picture of the user (JPEG format)
description: Picture for user account in JPEG format

label: PKI user certificate (DER format)
description: Public key infrastructure - user certificate

label: Issuer Country
description: Certificate Issuer Country

label: Issuer State
description: Certificate Issuer State

label: Issuer Location
description: Certificate Issuer Location

label: Issuer Organisation
description: Certificate Issuer Organisation

label: Issuer Organisational Unit
description: Certificate Issuer Organisational Unit

label: Issuer Common Name
description: Certificate Issuer Common Name

label: Issuer Mail
description: Certificate Issuer Mail

label: Subject Country
description: Certificate Subject Country

label: Subject State
description: Certificate Subject State

label: Subject Location
description: Certificate Subject Location

label: Subject Organisation
description: Certificate Subject Organisation

label: Subject Organisational Unit
description: Certificate Subject Organisational Unit

label: Subject Common Name
description: Certificate Subject Common Name

label: Subject Mail
description: Certificate Subject Mail

label: Valid from
description: Certificate valid from

label: Valid until
description: Certificate valid until

label: Version
description: Certificate Version

label: Serial
description: Certificate Serial

label: UMC user preferences
description: Key value pairs storing user preferences for UMC

label: Enable user for the following service providers
description: Enable user to use the specified service providers
